welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Landover, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport handles most domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves mainly American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves mainly Delta, United, and their partners.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 45 minutes per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport houses ticketing, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
